name: Noisy PiTs
description:
My first game,  submission for the Retro-Jam 2021 (or 2020.2) 

Definitely not Sillent Hills, excactly the opposite.

Three  original murder stories by the one and only Daniel Watson....

GFX by Mariana Lara......

Audio by Ivan Almazán.....

Programming by Naoki Horiuchi.....

Emotional support Doggo & border terrier, Freya....
